trans-unit.source: Provides helper methods for marshaling data between the .NET Framework and the Windows Runtime.
Adds the specified event handler to a [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] event.
A delegate that represents the method that adds event handlers to the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] event.
A delegate that represents the method that removes event handlers from the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] event.
A delegate the represents the event handler that is added.
The type of the delegate that represents the event handler.
addMethod is `null`.
-or-
removeMethod is `null`.
Frees the specified [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)][HSTRING](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=246451).
The address of the [HSTRING](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=246451) to free.
The [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] is not supported on the current version of the operating system.
Returns an object that implements the activation factory interface for the specified [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] type.
In addition to the exceptions in the Exceptions section, any `HRESULT` other than `S_OK` that is returned by the underlying factory method will be marshaled as an exception.
The [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] type to get the activation factory interface for.
An object that implements the activation factory interface.

type does not represent a [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] type (that is, belonging to the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] itself or defined in a [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] component).
-or-
The object specified for type was not provided by the common language runtime type system.
type is `null`.
The specified [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] class is not properly registered.
For example, the .winmd file was located, but the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] failed to locate the implementation.
Returns a managed string that contains a copy of the specified [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)][HSTRING](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=246451).
An unmanaged pointer to the [HSTRING](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=246451) to copy.
A managed string that contains a copy of the [HSTRING](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=246451) if ptr is not ; otherwise, .
The [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] is not supported on the current version of the operating system.
Removes all the event handlers that can be removed by using the specified method.
A delegate that represents the method that removes event handlers from the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] event.
removeMethod is `null`.
Removes the specified event handler from a [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] event.
A delegate that represents the method that removes event handlers from the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] event.
The event handler that is removed.
The type of the delegate that represents the event handler.
removeMethod is `null`.
Allocates a [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)][HSTRING](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=246451) and copies the specified managed string to it.

Use the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.WindowsRuntime.WindowsRuntimeMarshal.FreeHString%2A> method to release the [HSTRING](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=246451) when you are done using it.
The managed string to copy.
An unmanaged pointer to the new [HSTRING](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=246451), or if s is .
The [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] is not supported on the current version of the operating system.
s is `null`.
